import React from 'react'; import { Link, Outlet, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const AdminLayout = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); if (!user || user.role !== 'admin') { navigate('/login'); return null; } return (

); }; export default AdminLayout;
